LanguageData.VME_Scars_Honorable.label: honorable
LanguageData.VME_Scars_Honorable.description: Scars are marks of honor and strength, to be scarred and continue on is nothing short of an incredible act.
LanguageData.VME_Scars_Disgusting.label: disgusting
LanguageData.VME_Scars_Disgusting.description: A body marked with scars is disgusting.
